Description:
312351806 - KW/RW/150322/01 - You have failed to undertake any routine testing on the MWFs used in your two manual horizontal band saws on site to ensure that bacteria levels are maintained as low as reasonably practicable to minimise the risk of contact dermatitis.

312352120 - KW/RW/150322/02 - You have failed to ensure the mobile extraction units used in your workshop to capture welding fume have  been maintained in efficient working order and been subject to a Thorough Examination and Test to ensure they are operating effectively.
